segments.text: Hi Amy , you look very happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm very pleased . I've just got two tickets to see the Olympic opening ceremony .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . You must be very excited .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I certainly am . I would have been very disappointed if I hadn ’ t got them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we go to a restaurant to celebrate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a good idea . I'm quite hungry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . I feel very thirsty as well .
segments.speaker: S1
